"You get the sense that if George W. Bush said it was sunny, John Kerry would rise in indignation to speak about how a 10 percent possibility of light rain proves that George W. Bush has not been honest with the American people." --John Podhoretz 
 
 ...

post_info.post_title: Finding Fault is a tedious effort!

Come on, Jim, how tedious can it be. I'm thinking about starting a daily pool on how many Anti-Kerry threads you will start ... can't be all THAT tedious. I saw a cartoon in the paper the other day showing three Vietnam Swift Boat VETerinarianS who have a new book out exposing the fact that Kerry didn't have his dog in for shots for his entire tour .... sounds like thread material to me.
 Dono (my pool number for tomorrow is 3)

 When will that be...next April? Gads, I hope it isn't a close election again.

When will that be...next April? Gads, I hope it isn't a close election again.

 You're right, some suits have already been filed (Republicans - Ohio) and both have some pending. Flodida is missing 60,000 absentee votes, provisional votes will be challenged, some new machines have no paper trail for recount. If it is close as I believe it will be, it is going to be a circus. Last time we elected a President with 47.9% popular vote, I hope the winner this time wins both the popular and electoral vote.
 Dono
